thread.title: Blizzard bears down on New England

title: Blizzard bears down on New England
text:
Blizzard bears down on New England 2:35pm EDT - 01:01 
Driving snow enveloped the U.S. Northeast on Tuesday in its third winter storm in two weeks, closing schools, canceling flights and knocking out power across the region. Colette Luke has more. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
